targets.expr: sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{container="",container!="", namespace="", pod=~".*rpc.*"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{container="",container!="",resource="memory", namespace="", pod=~".*rpc.*"}) by (pod)

sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{container="",container!="", container != "", namespace="", pod=~".*rpc.*"}) by (pod)/ sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{container="",container!="", container != "", resource="memory", namespace="", pod=~".*rpc.*"}) by (pod)
